content: an *italian winter shawl* is a classic triangular shawl with relaxing garter stitch and eyelets throughout finished off with a neat and straightforward i-cord edge **yarn** 250 g of drops air 150 meters 164 yards / 50 g **measurements** width 170 cm 67 inch height 85 cm 33 inch **needles** 5 mm us 8 circular needles at least 80 cm 32 inch long **gauge** 15 sts and 28 row in 10 cm 4 inch in garter stitch **notes** - the shawl is worked flat back and forth from one tip towards the cast off edge and it s all garter stitch with i-cord edges and beautiful eyelets throughout - you can easily adjust the length based on the amount of yarn you have keep knitting until you have just enough yarn to work the cast off edge or until you re happy with the length **samples in pictures** - gray version 250 g 5 balls of drops air in the colorway 03 pearl gray - green version 300 g 6 balls of borgo de pazzi amore ws 115 supersoft cashmere in the colorway 45 green
